title: Literary Argument - opposing viewpoints and values

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the opposing viewpoints and values of older and younger characters contribute to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the opposing viewpoints and values of older and younger characters contribute to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
